content: For the fourth quarter of 2022, net revenues were $4.13 billion versus $4.04 billion a year ago, with adjusted EBITDA of $63 million and a margin of 1.5% compared to $317 million and a 7.8% margin in Q4 last year. For the fiscal year, our U.S. net revenues were $10.75 billion versus $9.11 billion in fiscal 2021 with adjusted EBITDA of $1.37 billion and a 12.7% margin compared to $896 million and a 9.8% margin last year.
